subject: Self Care
title: Sleep and Aging
description: A quick win: understand Sleep and Aging.

hook.text: People who consistently sleep well look younger in photo studies. Sleep literally affects how you age.

buildup.text: During deep sleep, growth hormone triggers skin cell repair and collagen production every night.

discovery.text: Short sleepers show faster cognitive decline and higher Alzheimer's risk in long-term studies.

twist.text: Sleep quality naturally declines with age. This creates a vicious cycle of poor sleep and faster aging.

climax.text: Prioritizing sleep in midlife is one of the most powerful things you can do for healthy longevity.

punchline.text: Want to age slower? Sleep deeper.

quiz.question: How does deep sleep affect aging?
options: Growth hormone repairs skin and protects cognition
